title: Bim Afolami – 2022 Comments on Rishi Sunak Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Bim Afolami, the Conservative MP for Hitchin and Harpenden, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: I am supporting Rishi. Rishi is the experienced leader to sort the economy, lead effectively, get us back into political contention, and unite the Party and country. He is the right choice.
